sentences.sentence: Now, following a decree from the interior ministry, families in the town will be allowed to adopt their soubriquet as a 2nd, official surname.
sentences.translation: 而现在，根据内政部的法令，基奥贾市的居民可用绰号作为正式的"第2姓名"。

sentences.sentence: Now, following a decree from the interior ministry, families in the town will be allowed to adopt their soubriquet as a second, official surname.
sentences.translation: 现在，根据内政部的一项法令，城镇居民允许将他们的绰号作为第二官方姓氏。
